parking.title: Parking
parking.description: Free parking is available in our main lot. Additional parking can be found:

options.option1: In the overflow lot across Faith Avenue
options.option3: In the community center lot (Sunday only)

parking.handicap: Handicap parking is available near the main entrance.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about our church

q1.question: What time are your services?
q1.answer: We have Sunday services at 9:00 AM and 11:00 AM, as well as a Wednesday evening service at 7:00 PM.

q2.question: What should I wear?
q2.answer: We have no dress code. Some people dress casually while others prefer more formal attire. We want you to feel comfortable, so come as you are!

q3.question: Do you have programs for children?
q3.answer: Yes, we have age-appropriate programs for children from nursery through 5th grade during all of our Sunday services. Our children's check-in area is located in the main lobby.

q4.question: How do I become a member?
q4.answer: We offer membership classes quarterly. These classes provide an overview of our church's beliefs, values, and vision. After completing the class, you can schedule a membership interview with one of our pastors.

q5.question: How can I get involved?
q5.answer: There are many ways to get involved! You can join a small group, serve on a ministry team, or participate in outreach events. Visit our Ministries page to learn more, or contact us for personalized recommendations.
